#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
#define mod 10000;
unsigned long ans[500001];
bool flag[500001]={0};

void answerdp(void)
{  
for(int i=0;i<=500000;i++)
ans[i]=1;
	for(int i=2;i<=250000;i++)
	{
		for(int j=2*i;j<=500000;j=j+i)
		 {
		 	ans[j]=(ans[j]*i);
		 	if(ans[j]>9999)
		 	flag[j]=1;
		 	ans[j]%=mod;
		 }
    }
}
    

int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int t;
	cin>>t;	
	answerdp();
    while (t--)
	{  
	  int a;
	  cin>>a;
	  if(flag[a]==1)
	  printf("%04lu\n",ans[a]);
	  else
	  printf("%lu\n",ans[a]);
	
	}
return 0;
}
